function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of GPS technology to monitor and record interaction frequency between infected and non-infected persons.","Impact":"Violation of privacy, potential for misuse of personal location data.","Mitigation":"Implement strict data protection policies and obtain explicit consent from individuals.","Technologies":"Data encryption, anonymization techniques.","People":"General public, individuals with health conditions.","Owner":"Health authorities, technology companies."},{"Description":"Monitoring user movements and alerting them based on zonal presence (green zone or red zone).","Impact":"Potential stigmatization of individuals in red zones, psychological impact.","Mitigation":"Ensure confidentiality of data, provide support for individuals in red zones.","Technologies":"Geofencing, encryption, secure data storage.","People":"General public, individuals in red zones.","Owner":"Health authorities, application developers."}]}
